title: Silence
description: Silence is the 4th Book in the Award-winning Wicked Woods Series. Wicked Woods, won the Fiction Horror Award for the 2011 International Books Awards and placed as a Finalist in Young Adult Fiction. Kailin Gow joins authors from St. Martin's Press, Simon and Shuster, Random House, and Zondervan as winners in the 2nd annual worldwide competition.
author: Kailin Gow
